job_tasks.phrase: play a key role in the development and delivery of our software products and apps
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly indicates the core responsibility of building and delivering software applications.

job_tasks.phrase: contribute to the development of innovative solutions
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the involvement in creating new software solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: designing and implementing systems that interact with our continuously evolving AI-powered platform
job_tasks.justification: This indicates the software engineering aspect of building systems that interface with AI technologies.

job_tasks.phrase: ensuring that what you deliver is scalable, reliable, and secure
job_tasks.justification: These are standard software development quality attributes for production systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Write production-grade product and platform code
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states the task of writing code for production environments.

job_tasks.phrase: Take responsibility for component technical designs and deliver quality code
job_tasks.justification: This covers the design and implementation aspects of software engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Our very own Generative AI tool for which customers have already generated over 40+ million images
job_tasks.justification: This refers to a product that utilizes Generative AI, implying work related to models.

job_tasks.phrase: Kicking this off with our very own AI Chatbot
job_tasks.justification: Developing an AI Chatbot falls under the domain of working with AI models.

soft_skills.phrase: ambitious and skilled Senior Go Engineer
Take responsibility for component technical designs
together with fellow developers, engineers, designers, and product managers
Promote feedback and knowledge sharing culture
Work with a strong agile mindset. Iterate fast and make data-driven decisions.

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes traditional software engineering tasks in Go, with a focus on building and delivering scalable, reliable, and secure applications. While it mentions interaction with AI-powered platforms and the development of a Generative AI tool and an AI Chatbot, these appear to be applications built *around* AI, rather than core AI/ML model development or deep specialization in GenAI techniques. The primary focus remains on software development using Go.
